name: @nicolasflamel/secp256k1-zkp-native
description: Node.js addon for parts of libsecp256k1-zkp

scripts.prepublishOnly: wget "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/secp256k1-zkp/archive/master.zip" && unzip "./master.zip" && rm "./master.zip" && find "./secp256k1-zkp-master/" -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 ! -name "src" ! -name "include" -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf "./secp256k1-zkp-master/src/asm/" && rm -rf "./secp256k1-zkp-master/src/java/" && wget "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package/archive/refs/heads/master.zip" && unzip "./master.zip" && rm "./master.zip" && sed -i 's/explicit_bzero(\(.*\),/memset(\1, 0,/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/^\([^\t\n].* [a-zA-Z0-9]*(\)\(.*)\)\(;\| {\)/\1InstanceData *instanceData, \2\3/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/, )/)/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/\(context\|scratchSpace\|generators\),/instanceData->\1,/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/main.cpp" && sed -i 's/\(isValidSecretKey(\|isZeroArray(\)\([^I]\)/\1instanceData, \2/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/main.cpp" && find "./Secp256k1-zkp-NPM-Package-master/" -mindepth 1 ! -name "main.cpp" -exec rm -rf {} +

author: Nicolas Flamel
